item.title: 【UPSCALED】imase - NIGHT DANCER [4K | HEVC 10-bit | PCM | Dolby TrueHD with Dolby Atmos]
item.description:
Genre: J-Pop, Indie Pop, Dance-Pop
Year: 2022
Video Source: Apple Music, 1080p, thanks SonMaxime
Audio Source: Qobuz & Amazon Music, thanks moi & SonMaxime

"NIGHT DANCER" is a song by Japanese singer-songwriter, Youtuber and Tiktoker Imase (Japanese: イマセ, born November 9, 2000). It's the sixth track from his first EP, Pop Cube, released in 2022.
Imase debuted in 2021 with his single "have a nice day" only a year after learning how to write and compose music, according to his signed label Universal Music Japan. His success with the viral single "Night Dancer" only a year later has given him the "monster rookie" nickname.

A former member of alternative rock band Supercar, lyricist, and producer Junji Ishiwatari said that Imase's sudden rise to stardom was "a true event that is stranger than fiction". Five months into his debut, he was hired to sing the Pocari Sweat jingle which is something that only the top artists were ever offered, and his TikTok views were speeding towards 1.1 billion. This was even before "Night Dancer" came into the world.

He became a topic of interest on South Korean blogging forums after "Night Dancer" entered the Melon 100 chart, the first ever Japanese song and Japanese singer to achieve this.

The music video, directed by MESS, was released on YouTube on august 30, 2022. In september 2023 it has reached 127 million views.

Release Info
The video track is upscaled to from 1080p to 4K with Topaz Video AI and encoded to HEVC 10-bit.
The Dolby Atmos track is downloaded and converted by SonMaxime and is synced by muxing.
The PCM tracks are lossless (Qobuz, CD quality) and are synced with Adobe Audition.
The timed lyrics are downloaded from YouTube. Enable the subtitles to see the lyrics.

This release contains 4 audio tracks
01. Original version
02. Dolby Atmos mix
03. BIG Naughty Remix
04. Instrumental
